channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:46 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:46 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 03:05 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 03:05 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
